question: How do the YouCookII retrieval results compare across the papers \\\\\\\"Temporal Alignment Networks for Long-term Video\\\\\\\", \\\\\\\"Temporal Alignment Representation with Contrastive Learning\\\\\\\", and \\\\\\\"Multi-granularity Correspondence Learning from Long-term Noisy Videos\\\\\\\"?
answer: In the paper \\\\\\\"Temporal Alignment Networks for Long-term Video\\\\\\\", their method achieved R@1 of 20.1% in zero-shot setting for YouCook2. In \\\\\\\"Temporal Alignment Representation with Contrastive Learning\\\\\\\", the R@1 achieved is 23.3%. In \\\\\\\"Multi-granularity Correspondence Learning from Long-term Noisy Videos\\\\\\\", the YouCookII clip-caption retrieval results show the best performance with a R@1 of 24.2%. Hence, \\\\\\\"Multi-granularity Correspondence Learning from Long-term Noisy Videos\\\\\\\" achieved the highest R@1 on YouCookII among the three papers.
reference: Temporal Alignment Networks for Long-term Video, Temporal Alignment Representation with Contrastive Learning, Multi-granularity Correspondence Learning from Long-term Noisy Videos

question: Compare the zero-shot video retrieval performance on the YouCook2 dataset between \\\\\\\"Multi-granularity Correspondence Learning from Long-term Noisy Videos\\\\\\\" and \\\\\\\"Temporal Alignment Networks for Long-term Video\\\\\\\".
answer: The zero-shot video retrieval performance on the YouCook2 dataset with R@1 is 24.2% for \\\\\\\"Multi-granularity Correspondence Learning from Long-term Noisy Videos\\\\\\\" compared to 20.1% reported by \\\\\\\"Temporal Alignment Networks for Long-term Video.\\\\\\\" Thus, \\\\\\\"Multi-granularity Correspondence Learning from Long-term Noisy Videos\\\\\\\" outperforms \\\\\\\"Temporal Alignment Networks for Long-term Video\\\\\\\" on this task.
reference: Multi-granularity Correspondence Learning from Long-term Noisy Videos, Temporal Alignment Networks for Long-term Video

question: Compare the zero-shot text-video retrieval performance on MSR-VTT dataset between \\\"Multi-granularity Correspondence Learning from Long-term Noisy Videos\\\" and \\\"Temporal Alignment Representation with Contrastive Learning\\\".
answer: \\\"Multi-granularity Correspondence Learning from Long-term Noisy Videos\\\" achieves a zero-shot R@1 of 10.7% on MSR-VTT. \\\"Temporal Alignment Representation with Contrastive Learning\\\" achieves a zero-shot R@1 of 10.4% on MSR-VTT, showing that \\\"Multi-granularity Correspondence Learning from Long-term Noisy Videos\\\" performs slightly better in zero-shot text-video retrieval on this dataset.
reference: Multi-granularity Correspondence Learning from Long-term Noisy Videos, Temporal Alignment Representation with Contrastive Learning

question: What is the difference in zero-shot video retrieval R@5 on YouCookII between \\\"Temporal Alignment Networks for Long-term Video\\\" and \\\"Temporal Alignment Representation with Contrastive Learning\\\"?
answer: \\\"Temporal Alignment Networks for Long-term Video\\\" achieves a zero-shot R@5 of 45.5% on YouCookII. \\\"Temporal Alignment Representation with Contrastive Learning\\\" achieves a zero-shot R@5 of 51.0% on YouCookII, showing that \\\"Temporal Alignment Representation with Contrastive Learning\\\" outperforms \\\"Temporal Alignment Networks for Long-term Video\\\" by 5.5% in zero-shot video retrieval R@5.
reference: Temporal Alignment Networks for Long-term Video, Temporal Alignment Representation with Contrastive Learning

question: What is the difference in R@1 for video-paragraph retrieval on YouCookII with background removed between \"Multi-granularity Correspondence Learning from Long-term Noisy Videos\" and \"Temporal Alignment Networks for Long-term Video\"?
answer: \"Multi-granularity Correspondence Learning from Long-term Noisy Videos\" achieves an R@1 of 88.7% for video-paragraph retrieval on YouCookII with background removed. \"Temporal Alignment Networks for Long-term Video\" achieves an R@1 of 49.4% for the same task, showing a difference of 39.3% in favor of \"Multi-granularity Correspondence Learning from Long-term Noisy Videos\".
reference: Multi-granularity Correspondence Learning from Long-term Noisy Videos, Temporal Alignment Networks for Long-term Video

question: Compare the video retrieval R@10 performance on YouCookII with background kept between \"Multi-granularity Correspondence Learning from Long-term Noisy Videos\" and \"Temporal Alignment Representation with Contrastive Learning\".
answer: \"Multi-granularity Correspondence Learning from Long-term Noisy Videos\" achieves a video retrieval R@10 of 97.7% on YouCookII with background kept. \"Temporal Alignment Representation with Contrastive Learning\" achieves a video retrieval R@10 of 94.7% for the same task, showing that \"Multi-granularity Correspondence Learning from Long-term Noisy Videos\" outperforms \"Temporal Alignment Representation with Contrastive Learning\" by 3%.
reference: Multi-granularity Correspondence Learning from Long-term Noisy Videos, Temporal Alignment Representation with Contrastive Learning
